title: Nursing Simulation Education Curriculum Utilizing Smart Classrooms and Virtual Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and fundamental patient care skills
context.additional_context: Conduct blended education combining virtual simulations and hands-on training in smart classrooms utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Perform patient status assessments and nursing intervention procedures with 90% accuracy in virtual simulation environments
Propose three or more nursing skill improvement strategies based on peer feedback through smart classroom collaboration activities
Integrate theoretical knowledge and simulation training results to present problem-solving solutions applicable to real clinical situations with over 70% success rate

resources: Smart Classroom Equipment (Interactive Whiteboard, Wireless Presentation Tools)
Nursing Practice Equipment (Manikin Patients, Medical Device Simulators)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
